nodes.text: The Biography of Master Thief Makuta

The Biography of Master Thief Makuta was a biographical book of the master thief Makuta. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the Besalisk Dexter Jettster looked through a box of reading material on the planet Pashvi that contained the biography. Jettster purchased the book that would become known as the Smuggler's Guide from the box, which had been tucked between The Biography of Master Thief Makuta and The Field Guide to Trammic Reptavians.
The Biography of Master Thief Makuta was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
